```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE}
raw <- read_csv("polls_IT-parliament_2018-10-01.csv")
```

```{r first_plot}
raw %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = date, y = LN, color = "red")) + geom_point() + geom_point(aes(x = date, y = M5S, color = "blue"))
```
